Events and trends
* 828 BC/827 BC (14th year in the era of GÃ²nghÃ©)âKing Xuan of Zhou becomes King
  of the Zhou Dynasty of China, ending almost two decades of the Gonghe Regency.
* 825 BCâTakelot II, king of Egypt, dies. Crown Prince Osorkon III and Shoshenq
  III, sons of Takelot, battle for the throne.
* 825 BC/824 BCâAriphron, King of Athens, dies after a reign of 20 years and is
  succeeded by his son Thespieus.
* 823 BCâDeath of Shalmaneser III, king of Assyria. He is succeeded by his son
  Shamshi-Adad V.
* 820 BCâPygmalion ascends the throne of Tyre.
